function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of voice assistants and social robots may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases by allowing interactions without physical contact.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virtual reality and holographic technology may create an illusion of physical presence, leading to reduced adherence to physical distancing measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of humanoid service robots in retail environments may lead to increased physical interactions and close contact, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for human-to-human contact during in-store shopping or pick-up","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced social interaction due to technology-mediated solutions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for sales and interactions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shoppers may feel on edge and try to keep a distance from other shoppers and employees.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Long queues at the store entrance may increase fear of contamination and negative feelings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased store crowding can lead to fear of contamination and decreased customer satisfaction.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impacts of covid-19 measures on utilitarian and hedonic shopping value","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear of contamination causing barriers to visiting stores and using services","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced social interaction due to social distancing measures in shopping environments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited opportunity for enjoyable shopping experiences due to restrictions and fears related to the pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contamination fear leading to lack of tactile input when shopping for products, both online and in-store.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 social distancing measures leading to long queues and reduced shopping efficiency.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased adoption of e-services and online retailing due to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Change in consumer privacy attitudes due to covid-19 crisis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift in consumer behavior towards online shopping and e-commerce","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing measures in stores","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unsanitary surfaces and lack of hand disinfecting points","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unregulated use of cash payments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consumers’ fear of contamination and increased reluctance to get close to other people and potentially contaminated objects.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Severe metamorphosis in the service sector, driven by government regulations safeguarding public health and consumers’ mindset.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overnight change to the physical and social servicescape in response to the containment measures and consumers’ fear of contamination.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to close contact in retail settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of retail establishments leading to economic impact","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited resources of the government may impact the effectiveness of support for consumer loans in housing and automotive industry.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Backlog in car production due to surge in demand after support for consumer loans.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased cooperation between government and financial sector may lead to efficient management of economic crises.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased marketing expenditures in banking and food service industries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of fast and deliberate response to the crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to act quickly on learnings and develop innovative service products for food service businesses","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of decreased customer confidence in banking services","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing measures in restaurants and cafes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hygiene standards in food service establishments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of staff health and provision of protective clothing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sending food to healthcare workers in various hospitals may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if proper hygiene measures are not taken in the food preparation and delivery process.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent change in customer preferences during turbulent environments may lead to challenges in maintaining food safety standards and hygiene practices.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased foot traffic in restaurants and cafes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial impact on restaurants and cafes if the campaign is not successful","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proactive actions in crisis phase","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on reactive measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective learning from crisis experiences","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in home delivery services leading to higher interaction between delivery personnel and customers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in persuading people to purchase ready-made food due to safety concerns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
